zh.our_advantage_one_value_01: 无需个人信用，无需出售代币
zh.our_advantage_one_value_02: 数字货币抵押，法币现金提现，1小时极速放款
zh.our_advantage_one_value_03: 熊市避免卖币损失，牛市增加资金杠杆，适合所有币圈用户，提高资金周转效率
zh.our_advantage_two_value_03: 贷款周期越长，年化利率越低，平均年化利率12%
zh.our_advantage_three_value_01: ETC、ETH支持智能合约托管抵押资产
zh.our_advantage_three_value_02: BTC使用最新HD冷钱包技术，抵押资产静态隔离
zh.our_advantage_three_value_03: 平台由同时拥有SEF和DCO资质的LedgerX托管，并经美国商务委权威认证
zh.our_advantage_four_value_01: BTC、ETH、BCH、ETC、LTC、EOS…支持多种数字货币抵押贷款
zh.our_advantage_four_value_02: 联系客服定制贷款金额、抵押币种、借款方式等，满足您的特殊贷款需求

en.our_advantage_one_value_01: No credit checks，no need to sell the tokens
en.our_advantage_one_value_02: Blockchain Mortgage, no need to sell cryptoassets . Loans can be withdrawn by a bank transfer within 1 hour
en.our_advantage_one_value_03: Flexible loan terms to improve the efficiency in the turnover of capital.
en.our_advantage_two_value_01: Loans can be obtained in variety of fiat currencies like CNY、USD、KRW and USDT
en.our_advantage_two_value_02: The  maximum  loan amount is 50 million CNY
en.our_advantage_two_value_03: APR is lower for longer term loans, the average APR is about 12%.
en.our_advantage_three_value_01: Collateral storage on smart contracts like ETC and ETH
en.our_advantage_three_value_02: the most advanced cold storage technology for BTC to help keep assets efficiently and safely
en.our_advantage_three_value_03: LedgerX helps the platform secure all crypto assets.  LedgerX LLC registered with the CFTC as a SEF and DCO in July 2017 for Bitcoin swaps.
en.our_advantage_four_value_01: Supporting popular cryptoassets asBTC、ETH、BCH、ETC、LTC、EOS etc. as the loan collateral.
en.our_advantage_four_value_02: Contact CS to explore our lending options and build your own exclusive loan plan.
